Header: Thief caught while robbing a house in Unawatuna
Content: Colombo (News1st): A thief captured while robbing a house in Unawatuna was handed over to the police. Reports suggest the suspect was a member of a group that robbed a number of houses in Unawatuna, Buttala, and Monaragala. The suspectâ€™s accomplice had fled the scene. The suspect in custody of the Buttala police will be produced before the Wellawaya magistrate court today.
